36#include "kadm5_locl.h"
37
38__RCSID("$NetBSD: destroy_s.c,v 1.2 2017/01/28 21:31:49 christos Exp $");
39
40/*
41 * dealloc a `kadm5_config_params'
42 */
43
44static void
45destroy_config (kadm5_config_params *c)
46{
47 free (c->realm);
48 free (c->dbname);
49 free (c->acl_file);
50 free (c->stash_file);
51}
52
53/*
54 * dealloc a kadm5_log_context
55 */
56
57static void
58destroy_kadm5_log_context (kadm5_log_context *c)
59{
60 free(c->log_file);
61 if (c->socket_fd != rk_INVALID_SOCKET)
62 rk_closesocket(c->socket_fd);
63#ifdef NO_UNIX_SOCKETS
64 if (c->socket_info) {
65 freeaddrinfo(c->socket_info);
66 c->socket_info = NULL;
67 }
68#endif
69}
70
71/*
72 * destroy a kadm5 handle
73 */
74
75kadm5_ret_t
76kadm5_s_destroy(void *server_handle)
77{
78 kadm5_ret_t ret = 0;
79 kadm5_server_context *context = server_handle;
80 krb5_context kcontext = context->context;
81
82 if (context->db != NULL)
83 ret = context->db->hdb_destroy(kcontext, context->db);
84 destroy_kadm5_log_context(&context->log_context);
85 destroy_config(&context->config);
86 krb5_free_principal(kcontext, context->caller);
87 if (context->my_context)
88 krb5_free_context(kcontext);
89 free(context);
90
91 return ret;
92}
93
